sentences.en: After school time, still often take shellfish to go out have fun.
sentences.cn: 课余的时候, 还常常带贝出去玩耍.

sentences.en: Common foods which cause this kind of reaction are fish, eggs, and shellfish.
sentences.cn: 引发这种不良反应的常见食物包括鱼、蛋和贝类。

sentences.en: Fish and shellfish are the specialities.
Fish and shellfish are the specialties.
sentences.cn: 鱼和甲壳类水生动物是特产。

sentences.en: He lived rough, eating off shellfish on the shore.
sentences.cn: 他生活艰难, 靠吃海岸的贝类过活.

sentences.en: However, coral and shellfish can be destroyed by heavy boats.
sentences.cn: 不过, 珊瑚及贝壳类,可以被人破坏重型改装的.

sentences.en: It is profitable to farm shellfish.
Rich oyster, mussel, clam, snail, seaweed, laver and other shellfish, algae.
sentences.cn: 盛产牡蛎 、 蛏 、 蛤 、 螺 、 海带 、 紫菜等贝 、 藻类.

sentences.en: Robert Daffin stays busy prying open the shellfish to serve customers.
sentences.cn: 达夫因一直忙于为顾客提供剖开牡蛎的服务.

sentences.en: Shellfish usually attach themselves to rocks.
sentences.cn: 贝类通常附着于岩石上.

sentences.en: Tests showed increased levels of toxin in shellfish.
sentences.cn: 检验表明水生有壳动物的毒素水平提高了。

sentences.en: The idea of eating raw shellfish nauseates me.
sentences.cn: 我一想到吃生贝就恶心.

sentences.en: They dug for shellfish at low tide.
sentences.cn: 退潮时他们在海滩上挖贝类。

sentences.en: They then survived by eating shellfish until they were rescued.
sentences.cn: 他们靠吃贝类存活了下来直到被救援.

sentences.en: Used as a starting fodder in the aquaculture ( industrial fish - farming, shellfish - farming ).
sentences.cn: 用作水产养殖业 ( 类养殖及贝类养殖 ) 最初饲料.

trans.tran_cn: 贝类动物，甲壳类动物，甲壳类（食物）
trans.tran_en: an animal that lives in water, has a shell, and can be eaten as food, for example  crab s  ,  lobster s  , and  oyster s
